content.raw:
The logic for filtering compiler warnings is different between this project and `ign-gui` for example. By default, there are very few warnings enabled here in `ign-common`, but I see some in `ign-gui` for plugin macros defined and used in `ign-common`.

For example, when configuring with cmake, here's a subset of the output I see for each project:

~~~
[ign_common:cmake] -- Checking ignition build type                                                                
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall                                                                      
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall - Success                                                            
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wextra                                                                    
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wextra - Success                                                          
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-long-long                                                             
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-long-long - Success                                                   
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-unused-value                                                          
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-unused-value - Success                                                
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wfloat-equal                                                              
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wfloat-equal - Success                                                    
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wshadow                                                                   
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wshadow - Success                                                         
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Winit-self                                                                
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Winit-self - Success                                                      
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wswitch-default                                                           
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wswitch-default - Success                                                 
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wmissing-include-dirs                                                     
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wmissing-include-dirs - Success                                           
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-pedantic                                                                  
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-pedantic - Success                                                        
[ign_common:cmake] -- Enable host CFlags                                                                          
[ign_common:cmake] -- Could not find hardware support for SSE2 on this machine.                                   
[ign_common:cmake] -- Could not find hardware support for SSE3 on this machine.                                   
[ign_common:cmake] -- Could not find hardware support for SSSE3 on this machine.                                  
[ign_common:cmake] -- Could not find hardware support for SSE4.1 on this machine.                                 
[ign_common:cmake] --                                                                                             
[ign_common:cmake] SSE4 disabled.                                                                                 
[ign_common:cmake]                                                                                                
[ign_common:cmake] -- Enable upstream CFlags                                                                      
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test GCC_SUPPORTS_VISIBILITY                                                     
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test GCC_SUPPORTS_VISIBILITY - Success                                           
[ign_common:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2  -fvisibility=hidden                                                  
[ign_common:cmake] -- Build Type: RelWithDebInfo  
~~~

~~~
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Checking ignition build type                                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Enable host CFlags                                                          
[ign_gui:cmake] --                                                                             
[ign_gui:cmake] SSE4 disabled.                                                                 
[ign_gui:cmake]                                                                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Enable upstream CFlags                                                      
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall                                                      
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall - Success                                            
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wextra                                                    
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wextra - Success                                          
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-long-long                                             
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-long-long - Success                                   
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-unused-value                                          
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-unused-value - Success                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wfloat-equal                                              
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wfloat-equal - Success                                    
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wshadow                                                   
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wshadow - Success                                         
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Winit-self                                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Winit-self - Success                                      
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wswitch-default                                           
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wswitch-default - Success                                 
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wmissing-include-dirs                                     
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wmissing-include-dirs - Success                           
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-pedantic                                                  
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-pedantic - Success                                        
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -std=c++11 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Build Type: RelWithDebInfo                           
~~~

The key lines are the ones that say `Custom CFlags:`

~~~
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -std=c++11 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic
~~~

~~~
[ign_common:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2  -fvisibility=hidden                                                  
~~~

Common is missing a lot of warning flags.
content.html:
The logic for filtering compiler warnings is different between this project and ign-gui for example. By default, there are very few warnings enabled here in ign-common, but I see some in ign-gui for plugin macros defined and used in ign-common.

For example, when configuring with cmake, here's a subset of the output I see for each project:

[ign_common:cmake] -- Checking ignition build type                                                                
[ign_common:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall

[ign_common:cmake] -- Could not find hardware support for SSE3 on this machine.

[ign_gui:cmake] -- Checking ignition build type                                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Enable host CFlags                                                          
[ign_gui:cmake] --                                                                             
[ign_gui:cmake] SSE4 disabled.                                                                 
[ign_gui:cmake]                                                                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Enable upstream CFlags                                                      
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall                                                      
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wall - Success                                            
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wextra                                                    
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wextra - Success                                          
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-long-long                                             
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-long-long - Success                                   
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-unused-value                                          
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wno-unused-value - Success                                
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wfloat-equal

[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wswitch-default - Success                                 
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wmissing-include-dirs                                     
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-Wmissing-include-dirs - Success                           
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Performing Test R-pedantic

[ign_gui:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -std=c++11 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic
[ign_gui:cmake] -- Build Type: RelWithDebInfo

The key lines are the ones that say Custom CFlags:

[ign_gui:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -std=c++11 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic

[ign_common:cmake] -- Custom CFlags: -g -O2  -fvisibility=hidden

Common is missing a lot of warning flags.
